Articles.Content: I thought that was my job!?  Couldn't help but notice on the load up screen that it was Recruiting and Motivating Kerbals. Just had to comment.

The loading screen refers to rounding-up and training wild Kerbals so that they are fit to appear in the game.
It has been said (by the voices in my head) that most of the training involves Pavlovian conditioning such that boosters become strongly associated with snacks.

It's the only proven way to get Kerbals into the vehicles that most of us build.
